product_name: Sea to Summit Pack Converter Duffle Bag
long_description: The Sea To Summit Pack Converter duffel bag encloses your backpack or child carrier for protection from rough handling during air, train and auto travel. Converter turns packs into luggage for air travel, functions on its own as a lightweight duffel or serves as a rain cover on the trail. Features internal reinforcement, 2 carry handles and an adjustable shoulder strap. Sea To Summit Pack Converter duffel bag is made of 210-denier ripstop nylon with sealed seams that repels water and helps eliminate damage to your pack while in transit.
short_description: The Sea To Summit Pack Converter duffel bag encloses your backpack or child carrier for protection from rough handling during air, train and auto travel.
